mapper.select: SELECT m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, m.serial_no, m.direct_flg, m.level FROM material m JOIN material_process mp ON `m`.material_id = `mp`.material_id AND `mp`.line_id = #{line_id} JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN (SELECT `pfp`.material_id, `pfp`.position_id, `pfp`.process_code, `pfp`.operate_result FROM ( SELECT `pf`.material_id, `pf`.position_id, `p`.process_code, `pf`.operate_result FROM production_feature pf JOIN `position` p ON `pf`.position_id = `p`.position_id AND `p`.line_id = #{line_id} WHERE operate_result not in (5, 8) AND `pf`.section_id = #{section_id} ORDER BY (1-ISNULL(`pf`.action_time)) , `pf`.action_time DESC, `pf`.operate_result DESC ) pfp GROUP BY `pfp`.material_id) ppf1 ON `m`.material_id = `ppf1`.material_id WHERE `m`.section_id = #{section_id} AND ppf1.operate_result = 3 AND (`mp`.`finish_date` IS NULL)

SELECT m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, m.serial_no, m.direct_flg, m.level FROM material m JOIN material_process mp ON `m`.material_id = `mp`.material_id AND `mp`.line_id = #{line_id} JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN (SELECT `pfp`.material_id, `pfp`.position_id, `pfp`.process_code, `pfp`.operate_result FROM ( SELECT `pf`.material_id, `pf`.position_id, `p`.process_code, `pf`.operate_result FROM production_feature pf JOIN `position` p ON `pf`.position_id = `p`.position_id AND `p`.line_id = #{line_id} WHERE operate_result not in (5, 8) AND `pf`.section_id = #{section_id} ORDER BY (1-ISNULL(`pf`.action_time)) , `pf`.action_time DESC, `pf`.operate_result DESC ) pfp GROUP BY `pfp`.material_id) ppf1 ON `m`.material_id = `ppf1`.material_id WHERE `m`.section_id = #{section_id} AND (`m`.scheduled_expedited = 1 OR `mp`.line_expedited = 1) AND (`mp`.`finish_date` IS NULL)

SELECT m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, m.serial_no, m.direct_flg, m.level FROM material m JOIN material_process mp ON `m`.material_id = `mp`.material_id AND `mp`.line_id = #{line_id} JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN (SELECT `pfp`.material_id, `pfp`.position_id, `pfp`.process_code, `pfp`.operate_result FROM ( SELECT `pf`.material_id, `pf`.position_id, `p`.process_code, `pf`.operate_result FROM production_feature pf JOIN `position` p ON `pf`.position_id = `p`.position_id AND `p`.line_id = #{line_id} WHERE operate_result not in (5, 8) AND `pf`.section_id = #{section_id} ORDER BY (1-ISNULL(`pf`.action_time)) , `pf`.action_time DESC, `pf`.operate_result DESC ) pfp GROUP BY `pfp`.material_id) ppf1 ON `m`.material_id = `ppf1`.material_id JOIN (select f_addworkdays(current_date, -in_advance div 8) as `day` from line where line_id = #{line_id}) bq WHERE `m`.section_id = #{section_id} AND `mp`.scheduled_date <= bq.`day` AND (`mp`.`finish_date` IS NULL)

SELECT m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, m.serial_no, m.direct_flg, m.level FROM material m JOIN material_process mp ON `m`.material_id = `mp`.material_id AND `mp`.line_id = #{line_id} JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN (SELECT `pfp`.material_id, `pfp`.position_id, `pfp`.process_code, `pfp`.operate_result FROM ( SELECT `pf`.material_id, `pf`.position_id, `p`.process_code, `pf`.operate_result FROM production_feature pf JOIN `position` p ON `pf`.position_id = `p`.position_id AND `p`.line_id = #{line_id} WHERE operate_result not in (5, 8) AND `pf`.section_id = #{section_id} ORDER BY (1-ISNULL(`pf`.action_time)) , `pf`.action_time DESC, `pf`.operate_result DESC ) pfp GROUP BY `pfp`.material_id) ppf1 ON `m`.material_id = `ppf1`.material_id WHERE `m`.section_id = #{section_id} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PRODUCTION_FEATURE WHERE material_id = m.material_id AND position_id = 23 AND section_id = #{section_id} AND operate_result = 2) AND (`mp`.`finish_date` IS NULL)

select m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, cast(m.direct_flg as char) as direct_flg , cast(m.level as char) as level , DATE_FORMAT(mp12.finish_date, "%m-%d") as com_finish_date , DATE_FORMAT(mp13.finish_date, "%m-%d") as ns_finish_date , p12.process_code as com_process_code, p13.process_code as ns_process_code from material m JOIN material_process mp12 ON m.material_id = mp12.material_id AND mp12.line_id = 12 JOIN material_process mp13 ON m.material_id = mp13.material_id AND mp13.line_id = 13 JOIN production_feature pf12 ON m.material_id = pf12.material_id AND pf12.finish_time is null JOIN production_feature pf13 ON m.material_id = pf13.material_id AND pf13.finish_time is null LEFT JOIN position p12 ON pf12.position_id = p12.position_id AND p12.line_id = 12 LEFT JOIN position p13 ON pf13.position_id = p13.position_id AND p13.line_id = 13 JOIN `model` mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id WHERE m.section_id = #{section_id} AND (mp12.finish_date IS NULL OR mp13.finish_date IS NULL) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM production_feature WHERE position_id = 30 AND operate_result <> 0 AND material_id = m.material_id) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM material_partial WHERE bo_flg = 1 AND material_id = m.material_id) ORDER BY sorc_no

select m.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, cast(m.direct_flg as char) as direct_flg , cast(m.level as char) as level , DATE_FORMAT(mp12.finish_date, "%m-%d") as com_finish_date , DATE_FORMAT(mp13.finish_date, "%m-%d") as ns_finish_date , p12.process_code as com_process_code, p13.process_code as ns_process_code from material m JOIN material_process mp12 ON m.material_id = mp12.material_id AND mp12.line_id = 12 JOIN material_process mp13 ON m.material_id = mp13.material_id AND mp13.line_id = 13 JOIN production_feature pf12 ON m.material_id = pf12.material_id AND pf12.finish_time is null JOIN production_feature pf13 ON m.material_id = pf13.material_id AND pf13.finish_time is null LEFT JOIN position p12 ON pf12.position_id = p12.position_id AND p12.line_id = 12 LEFT JOIN position p13 ON pf13.position_id = p13.position_id AND p13.line_id = 13 JOIN `model` mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id WHERE m.level <> 1 AND m.section_id = #{section_id} AND (mp13.finish_date IS NULL) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM production_feature WHERE position_id = 00000000023 AND operate_result <> 0 AND material_id = m.material_id) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM material_partial WHERE bo_flg = 1 AND material_id = m.material_id) ORDER BY sorc_no

SELECT count(1) FROM schedule_history sh join material ma on sh.material_id = ma.material_id where sh.scheduled_date = current_date and remove_flg = 0 and ma.section_id = #{section_id} and sh.plan_day_period = #{out_period};

select count(1) from (select ma.material_id, max(finish_time) as finish_time , exists (select 1 from production_feature pfi join position posi ON pfi.position_id = posi.position_id where ma.material_id = pfi.material_id AND posi.line_id = #{line_id} and posi.position_id not in (25, 60) AND pfi.section_id = #{section_id} limit 1) indeed_work_in_section from production_feature pf join position pos on pf.position_id = pos.position_id join material ma ON pf.material_id = ma.material_id and ma.break_back_flg = 0 join material_process mp ON mp.material_id = ma.material_id and mp.line_id = #{line_id} where mp.finish_date = current_date AND pos.line_id = #{line_id}
AND ma.model_id not in (select model_id from v_model where kind = '03')
group by ma.material_id order by finish_time desc ) m14 where indeed_work_in_section = 1 and m14.finish_time >= current_date
and time(finish_time) < '10:00:00'
and time(finish_time) between '10:00:00' and '12:00:00'
and time(finish_time) between '12:00:00' and '15:00:00'
and time(finish_time) > '15:00:00'
;
